## 4.1.2
```{r}
logit <- function(x) {
  result <- log(x /(1-x))
}

softmax <- function(v) {
  numerator <- exp(v)
  denominator <- sum(exp(v))
  result <- numerator / denominator
}

result <- softmax(c(1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3, 3, 3))
print(result)
print(sum(result))
```
